overview: Frank Torregrosa was appointed Manager of the “wafer fab” Business Unit in 2007. After joining IBS in 1996 as Product Engineer for the development of the Plasma Immersion technology, in 2000 Frank became the head of R&D Department as leader of the PULSION R&D program and development of microtechnology activities. Frank Torregrosa was previously leading research and teaching at the ENSAM Engineering School after receiving his PhD in Material Science : Study of wear reduction on hip prosthesis, Application of ion implantation. He is Co-author of more than 40 international publications and at the originator of the PulsionÂ® the Plasma Ion Implanter technology.
